name: Egg Rescue (yy404)
description:
Game Description

This is an entry for Geta Game Jam 12 with theme "Unstable".

Rescue the egg by moving it to the end of road. Do NOT drop it.

Controls: Arrow keys (or W/A/S/D)

Additional Notes

Keeping slow is the secret to win.

My wife and I made this together. Hope you enjoy it!

Fixes/Changes

  • The jam version (v1.0.0) is available for download.
  • The updated version will be played in the browser:
    • Egg movement is adjusted for easier control.
  • Details available: https://github.com/yy404/GETA12
